text: Norma Christine Waterson (15 August 1939 â€“ 30 January 2022) was an English singer. She was best known as one of the original members of The Watersons. Other members of the group included her brother Mike Waterson and sister Lal Waterson. She later worked with her husband Martin Carthy. She was born in Hull, East Riding of Yorkshire, England. Waterson died on 30 January 2022 from pneumonia, at the age of 82. ==References== Category:1939 births Category:2022 deaths Category:English singer-songwriters Category:Musicians from Yorkshire Category:People from Kingston upon Hull
title: Norma Waterson
